frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-battery-threshold
frozen.shortDescription: A simple extension for gnome-shell that let easily set a threshold to limit battery charge level.
frozen.longDescription:
A simple extension for gnome-shell that let easily set a threshold to limit battery charge level.

This extension uses "pkexec" since sudo permissions are needed to change the threshold level.

Tested on Fedora Silverblue 35 (gnome-shell 3.41) on an Asus Vivobook.

Github page: https://github.com/francku/gnome-shell-extension-battery-threshold
